com.hbm.devices.scan.configure

Interface ConfigurationCallback


  • public interface ConfigurationCallback
    This is the callback interface to handle the responses received from a device.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(Response response)
      This is the callback method which is called, when an error occurred processing the query by the device.
      void onSuccess(Response response)
      This is the callback method which is called, when the query was received and processed successfully by the device.
      void onTimeout(long timeout)
      This is the callback method which is called, if the device does not send a response within the timeout.

    • Method Detail

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess(Response response)
        This is the callback method which is called, when the query was received and processed successfully by the device.
        Parameters:
        response - This parameter contains the response, which is received from the device

      • onError

        void onError(Response response)
        This is the callback method which is called, when an error occurred processing the query by the device.
        Parameters:
        response - This parameter contains the response, which is received from the device

      • onTimeout

        void onTimeout(long timeout)
        This is the callback method which is called, if the device does not send a response within the timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The timeout in seconds that has been expired.
